summary: This node allows you to interact with the Monday.com API to perform operations such as creating, getting, and archiving boards.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: The type of authentication to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The type of resource to interact with (Board, Board Column, Board Group, Board Item, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the selected resource (Archive, Create, Get, Get Many, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: Board unique identifiers. Required for certain operations like archiving or getting a specific board.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the board to create.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: The kind of board to create (Share, Public, Private).

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a board, such as template ID.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Whether to return all items when getting many boards.
